title: Google Search Scraper
description: Extract Google Search results including organic listings, knowledge panels, People Also Ask, and more.

query.title: Search Query
query.description: The search term or phrase to look up on Google

location.title: Location
location.description: Geographic location for localized results (e.g., 'New York, NY, USA', 'London, UK')

gl.title: Country
gl.description: Two-letter country code for Google's country service (e.g., 'us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr')

hl.title: Language
hl.description: Two-letter language code for the interface (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'es', 'fr')

start.title: Start Position
start.description: Result offset for pagination. Use 0 for first page, 10 for second, 20 for third, etc.

amount.title: Number of Results
amount.description: How many results to return per request (1-100)

tbs.title: Time Filter
tbs.description: Filter results by time. Examples: 'qdr:h' (past hour), 'qdr:d' (past day), 'qdr:w' (past week), 'qdr:m' (past month), 'qdr:y' (past year)

tbm.title: Search Type
tbm.description: Type of Google search to perform
